entry.title: Friday: Periods of drizzle or rain. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain showers or freezing rain ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle late this morning. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Rain showers or freezing rain changing to freezing rain or ice pellets near noon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 14 April 2023
